post.text: A 15-year-old girl to Hillary: "I see with my own eyes the damage Donald Trump does when he talks about women and how they look. As the first female president, how would you undo some of that damage and help girls understand that they are so much more than just what they look like?" Watch Hillary's response.

comment.author: Logan
comment.text: If Wells-Fargo is so bad, will Hillary give back the $50 million she got for giving a speech at Wells-Fargo? If Donald Trump was bad taking a loss on his business in 1984 then the same of the Clintons, they claimed a loss in 2015 after making millions in speaking fees $8 million for salary as former President.

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: She lied yesterday and said she's going to show wells fargo. When pigs fly.

replies.author: Stevie Lynn
replies.text: Wells Fargo are thieves. Hillary did not get $50 million for any speech. You TRUMPERY TROLLS are all liars and I hope you are being paid well for the loss of your honor and dignity.

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Total speeches Bernie Hillary let's see your Wallstreet speech Tanscripts. On a debate he won .
